Auckland construction and oil industry figures charged in steel beam meth bust https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-construction-and-oil-industry-figures-charged-in-steel-beam-meth-bust/PBVLPOMJSZC4FH6JN4AAKBF7EQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-construction-and-oil-industry-figures-charged-in-steel-beam-meth-bust/PBVLPOMJSZC4FH6JN4AAKBF7EQ/ George Block, Jared SavageThe pair are among five men before the courts over the seized drugs. Sat, 19 Oct 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Police and Customs found 515kg of methamphetamine inside these steel beams imported from the United States in September. Five men aged between 31 and 51 were arrested and charged with drug offences following Operation Girder. One of the men arrested in Operation Girder was also charged with the illegal possession of a military-style firearm and ammunition. Photo / Police

HMNZS Manawanui: New details emerge of rescue of Kiwi sailors and passengers by Malaysian ship as questions remain over grounding https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hmnzs-manawanui-new-details-emerge-of-rescue-of-kiwi-sailors-and-passengers-by-malaysian-ship-as-questions-remain-过接地/JCXBQBEDYZA2PFTVYFGLQHTXKU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hmnzs-manawanui-new-details-emerge-of-rescue-of-kiwi-sailors-and-passengers-by-malaysian-ship-as-questions-remain-过接地/JCXBQBEDYZA2PFTVYFGLQHTXKU/ George BlockThe Herald has obtained exclusive new accounts of the brave rescue, fraught with danger. Missing Marokopa family: Police have ‘ready access’ to New Zealand Defence Force if needed during search - commissioner https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/missing-marokopa-family-police-have-ready-access-to-new-zealand-defence-force-if-needed-during-search-commissioner/ QHJDQW3UPFDYZNXDGM5YEFCXZ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/missing-marokopa-family-police-have-ready-access-to-new-zealand-defence-force-if-needed-during-search-commissioner/ QHJDQW3UPFDYZNXDGM5YEFCXZ4/ Julia Gabel'I can assure you that support has been called on through the course of this operation.'
